00080 void WMG::init(const int _N, const double _T, const double _hCoM)
00081 {
00082     current_step_number = 0;
00083     gravity = 9.81; // hard-coded
00084 
00085     N = _N;
00086     hCoM = _hCoM;      
00087 
00088 
00089 
00090     X = new double[NUM_VAR*N];
00091 
00092     for(int i=0; i<NUM_STATE_VAR; i++)
00093     {
00094         X_tilde[i] = 0.0;
00095     }
00096 
00097     T = new double[N];
00098     h = new double[N];
00099     for (int i = 0; i < N; i++)
00100     {
00101         T[i] = _T;
00102         h[i] = hCoM/gravity;
00103     }
00104 
00105     angle = new double[N];
00106     zref_x = new double[N];
00107     zref_y = new double[N];
00108     lb = new double[2*N];
00109     ub = new double[2*N];
00110 
00111 
00112 
00114     def_constraint[0] = 0.09;
00115     def_constraint[1] = 0.025;
00116     def_constraint[2] = 0.03;
00117     def_constraint[3] = 0.025;
00118     def_repeat_times = 4;
00119 
00120     def_ds_constraint[0] = 0.07;
00121     def_ds_constraint[1] = 0.025;
00122     def_ds_constraint[2] = 0.025;
00123     def_ds_constraint[3] = 0.025;
00124     def_ds_num = 0;
00125 }

00143 void WMG::AddFootstep(
00144         const double x_relative, 
00145         const double y_relative, 
00146         const double angle_relative, 
00147         const int n_this, 
00148         const int n, 
00149         const double *d, 
00150         const fs_type type)
00151 {
00152     def_constraint[0] = d[0];
00153     def_constraint[1] = d[1];
00154     def_constraint[2] = d[2];
00155     def_constraint[3] = d[3];
00156     def_repeat_times = n_this;
00157     def_ds_num = n - n_this;
00158     AddFootstep(x_relative, y_relative, angle_relative, type);
00159 }

00177 void WMG::AddFootstep(
00178         const double x_relative,

00182         const int n, 
00183         const fs_type type)
00184 {

00186     def_ds_num = n - n_this;
00187     AddFootstep(x_relative, y_relative, angle_relative, type);

00191 
00204 void WMG::AddFootstep(
00205         const double x_relative, 
00206         const double y_relative, 
00207         const double angle_relative, 
00208         const fs_type type)
00209 {
00210     if (FS.size() == 0)
00211     {
00212         // this is the first ("virtual") step.
00213         FS.push_back(
00214                 FootStep(
00215                     angle_relative, 
00216                     x_relative,
00217                     y_relative, 
00218                     def_repeat_times, 
00219                     type,
00220                     def_constraint));
00221     }
00222     else
00223     {
00224         // Angle and position of the previous step
00225         double prev_a = FS.back().angle;
00226         Point2D prev_p(FS.back());        
00227 
00228 
00229         // Position of the next step
00230         Point2D next_p(prev_p);        
00231         next_p.x += FS.back().ca*x_relative - FS.back().sa*y_relative;
00232         next_p.y += FS.back().sa*x_relative + FS.back().ca*y_relative;
00233 
00234 
00235         // Add double support constraints that lie between the
00236         // newly added step and the previous step
00237         for (int i = 0; i < def_ds_num; i++)
00238         {
00239             double theta = (double) (i+1)/(def_ds_num + 1);
00240             double ds_a = prev_a + angle_relative * theta;
00241 
00242             FS.push_back(
00243                     FootStep(
00244                         ds_a, 
00245                         (1-theta)*prev_p.x + theta*next_p.x,
00246                         (1-theta)*prev_p.y + theta*next_p.y,
00247                         1, 
00248                         FS_TYPE_DS,
00249                         def_ds_constraint));
00250         }
00251 
00252 
00253         // add the new step
00254         FS.push_back(
00255                 FootStep(
00256                     prev_a + angle_relative, 
00257                     next_p.x, 
00258                     next_p.y, 
00259                     def_repeat_times, 
00260                     type,
00261                     def_constraint));
00262     }    
00263 }

00272 WMGret WMG::FormPreviewWindow()
00273 {
00274     WMGret retval = WMG_OK;
00275     int win_step_num = current_step_number;
00276     int step_repeat_times = FS[win_step_num].repeat_times;
00277 
00278 
00279     for (int i = 0; i < N;)
00280     {
00281         if (step_repeat_times > 0)
00282         {
00283             angle[i] = FS[win_step_num].angle;
00284             zref_x[i] = FS[win_step_num].x;
00285             zref_y[i] = FS[win_step_num].y;
00286 
00287             lb[i*2] = -FS[win_step_num].d[2];
00288             ub[i*2] = FS[win_step_num].d[0];
00289 
00290             lb[i*2 + 1] = -FS[win_step_num].d[3];
00291             ub[i*2 + 1] = FS[win_step_num].d[1];
00292 
00293             step_repeat_times--;
00294             i++;
00295         }
00296         else
00297         {
00298             win_step_num++;
00299             if (win_step_num == (int) FS.size())
00300             {
00301                 retval = WMG_HALT;
00302                 printf(" \n\n====================================\n ");        
00303                 printf(" WARNING: not enough steps in FS.");
00304                 printf(" \n====================================\n\n ");        
00305                 break;
00306             }
00307             step_repeat_times = FS[win_step_num].repeat_times;
00308         }
00309     }
00310 
00311     FS[current_step_number].repeat_times--;
00312     if (FS[current_step_number].repeat_times == 0)
00313     {
00314         current_step_number++;
00315     }
00316 
00317     return (retval);
00318 }

00328 void WMG::FS2file(const std::string filename)
00329 {
00330     
00331     FILE *file_op = fopen(filename.c_str(), "w");
00332     
00333     if(!file_op)
00334     {
00335         std::cerr << "Cannot open file (for writing) " << std::endl;
00336         return;
00337     }
00338     
00339     fprintf(file_op,"%%\n%% Footsteps generated using the c++ version of the WMG\n%%\n\n");
00340     
00341     int i;
00342     for (i=0; i< (int) FS.size(); i++ )
00343     {
00344         fprintf(file_op, "FS(%i).a = %f;\nFS(%i).p = [%f;%f];\nFS(%i).d = [%f;%f;%f;%f];\n", 
00345                 i+1, FS[i].angle, 
00346                 i+1, FS[i].x, FS[i].y, 
00347                 i+1, FS[i].d[0], FS[i].d[1], FS[i].d[2], FS[i].d[3]);
00348 
00349         fprintf(file_op, "FS(%i).D = [%f %f;%f %f;%f %f;%f %f];\n", 
00350                 i+1, FS[i].D[0], FS[i].D[4],
00351                      FS[i].D[1], FS[i].D[5],
00352                      FS[i].D[2], FS[i].D[6],
00353                      FS[i].D[3], FS[i].D[7]); 
00354 
00355         fprintf(file_op, "FS(%i).v = [%f %f; %f %f; %f %f; %f %f; %f %f];\n", 
00356                 i+1, FS[i].vert[0].x, FS[i].vert[0].y, 
00357                      FS[i].vert[1].x, FS[i].vert[1].y, 
00358                      FS[i].vert[2].x, FS[i].vert[2].y, 
00359                      FS[i].vert[3].x, FS[i].vert[3].y, 
00360                      FS[i].vert[0].x, FS[i].vert[0].y);
00361 
00362         if (FS[i].type == FS_TYPE_DS)
00363         {
00364             fprintf(file_op, "FS(%i).type = 1;\n\n", i+1);
00365         }
00366         if (FS[i].type == FS_TYPE_SS)
00367         {
00368             fprintf(file_op, "FS(%i).type = 2;\n\n", i+1);
00369         }
00370     }
00371 
00372     fprintf(file_op,"hold on\n");    
00373     fprintf(file_op,"for i=1:length(FS)\n");
00374     fprintf(file_op,"    if FS(i).type == 1;\n");
00375     fprintf(file_op,"        plot (FS(i).p(1),FS(i).p(2),'gs','MarkerFaceColor','r','MarkerSize',2)\n");
00376     fprintf(file_op,"        plot (FS(i).v(:,1), FS(i).v(:,2), 'c');\n");
00377     fprintf(file_op,"    end\n");
00378     fprintf(file_op,"    if FS(i).type == 2;\n");
00379     fprintf(file_op,"        plot (FS(i).p(1),FS(i).p(2),'gs','MarkerFaceColor','g','MarkerSize',4)\n");
00380     fprintf(file_op,"        plot (FS(i).v(:,1), FS(i).v(:,2), 'r');\n");
00381     fprintf(file_op,"    end\n");
00382     fprintf(file_op,"end\n");
00383     fprintf(file_op,"grid on; axis equal\n");
00384     fclose(file_op);  
00385 }
